item.title: Minimalism
item.description: [!Hint] The main purpose of this is to relieve mental load from daily activities. If you wear the same clothes everyday, eat the same thing, and do the same routine, you unblock your mind so it can think about other important things, not what you’re going to eat tomorrow (because you already know that).
